name: Find and Seek-rifice
description:
Oh no, you forgot to attend the Munson pep rally! For these crimes against humanity, you've been sent to see God and atone for your sins. Luckily for you, he offers you an option! Either spend an eternity with him as punishment... or run around your home sacrificing whichever objects he desires to him! But hurry, if you don't fulfill his wishes before time runs out, who knows what'll happen!

Find and Seek-rifice was made in approximately 43 hours for the RGDC Halloween Game Jam.
-----------------------------------------------
